Articles.Content:
Behold! the KR17 series brought to you by none other than Blockhead-Martin (child company of Third Dimension Aerospace Development Industries). 

Versions MkI-MkVI are pictured below. Will post craft files once I learn how and where to do that @\_@

and for some reason the photos uploaded backwards @\_@

[http://pollodelfuego31.imgur.com/all/?third_party=1](http://pollodelfuego31.imgur.com/all/?third_party=1)

To upload craft files try [kerbalx](http://kerbalx.com)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T05:16:13Z" title="04/29/2015 05:16  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by ExplorerKlatt**

I uploaded the MkIII and MkVI versions to Kerbalx.com

[http://kerbalx.com/PolloPlays/Blockhead-Kerman-KR17-MkVI](http://kerbalx.com/PolloPlays/Blockhead-Kerman-KR17-MkVI)

h[http://kerbalx.com/PolloPlays/Blockhead-Kerman-KR17-MkIII](http://kerbalx.com/PolloPlays/Blockhead-Kerman-KR17-MkIII)

If you want to play with one of the other four, let me know (they all pretty much fly the same in atmo. The new aerodynamics model is killing my speed due to compression heating)
